title: InvestIQ
blurb: Building a cross-platform AI investment assistant using Python and Electron to deliver personalized, real-time trading insights via screen analysis, market data, and custom-trained models.
descriptionMD:
## InvestIQ

A real-time AI-powered trading assistant that overlays personalized investment tips on your screen, trained on your own strategies and trade history.

### Architecture
- **Frontend**: Electron.js for floating UI overlay
- **Backend**: Python + FastAPI for AI predictions
- **AI Models**: PyTorch for vision models, TensorFlow for time-series forecasting, Hugging Face Transformers for LLM-based commentary
- **Market Data**: yfinance, Alpha Vantage, and Polygon APIs

### Key Features
- Real-time screen OCR and chart recognition
- Personalized LLM insights fine-tuned on your trade history
- Floating overlay UI with actionable trading suggestions
- Continuous reinforcement learning from user decisions

title: QuickMap
blurb: Developed an intelligent activity planner using Google Maps Places API and SeatGeek API, featuring suggested activities and events based on user location and preferences.
descriptionMD:
## Activity Planner

An intelligent activity planner using Google Maps Places API and SeatGeek API, featuring suggested activities and events based on user location and preferences.

### Architecture
- **Frontend**: React with TypeScript and Material-UI
- **Backend**: Node.js with Express
- **AI Integration**: OpenAI GPT-4 API with custom fine-tuning
- **Database**: MongoDB

### Key Features
- Real-time location-based activity directory
- Activity Categorization(fun, hikes, food, etc.)
- Detailed activity planning
- Modern, responsive UI
- Future IOS app integration ready

title: FitJacket
blurb: Developed a fully functional fitness app using Django and a combination of APIs to track progress and provide personalized recommendations.
descriptionMD:
## FitJacket

Personaled Fitness app for the elderly and disabled

### Architecture
- **Frontend**: Python with HTML, CSS, and JavaScript
- **API Integration**: OpenAI for fitness recommendations, Strava for activity tracking
- **Database**: SQLite

### Key Features
- AI Suggested Activities
- Friendly features: Light Contrast Mode, Large Text
- Strava integration
- Modern, responsive UI,

title: MedGPT
blurb: Building a conversational medical assistant that delivers instant, safe, and reliable medical guidance using AI technology, with built-in safety features and structured citations.
descriptionMD:
## MedGPT

A web-based conversational assistant providing medical information with safety-focused features and structured citations.

### Architecture
- **Frontend**: React 18, TypeScript, Tailwind CSS for a modern, responsive chat interface
- **Backend**: Node.js with Express for secure API endpoints and business logic
- **AI**: OpenAI GPT-4 API (configurable for other LLMs) for generating medical guidance
- **Database**: SQLite in development and PostgreSQL in production for session storage and logs

### Key Features
- ChatGPT-style conversational UI with light/dark mode
- Structured citations linking responses to medical literature
- Safety guardrails including disclaimers and content filtering
- Triage recommendations to suggest appropriate care levels
- Exportable chat transcripts for patient-doctor communication
- Responsive design for seamless desktop and mobile experience

title: InterviewBot
blurb: Building a scalable mock interview platform with AI-driven question analysis and a rich UI for CS students to practice coding patterns and prepare for technical interviews.
descriptionMD:
## InterviewBot

A mock interview platform helping CS majors practice LeetCode-style questions with a focus on patterns and structured interview prep.

### Architecture
- **Frontend**: React/Next.js + Tailwind CSS for an interactive chat-based UI
- **Backend**: Node.js (Express/Fastify) or Python (FastAPI) for REST/GraphQL APIs, session management, and integration with LLMs
- **Scraper**: Python-based microservice scraping fresh interview questions from LeetCode, GeeksforGeeks, and more
- **Database**: PostgreSQL for structured data, with optional vector DB (Pinecone/Weaviate) for semantic search

### Key Features
- AI-powered interview agent that asks, analyzes, and scores coding answers
- Pattern-based question selection to target user weaknesses
- Interactive UI with timers, hints, and real-time feedback
- Persistent history of interview sessions
- Scraper service that keeps the question bank updated automatically
- Dockerized microservices architecture for easy deployment
